content.question: Of the following pairs of points, which are on the graph of <math alttext="h"> <mi>h</mi> </math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parentheses negative 3 comma negative 1 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses negative 9 comma negative 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>9</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses 1 comma 1 third close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 2 comma 1 over 9 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses 1 comma 3 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 2 comma 9 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="open parentheses 3 comma 1 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 9 comma 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>9</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parentheses 3 comma 1 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 9 comma 2 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mn>9</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
